Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Malibu in 1982...
Injured on 5/26/1983 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/5/1984 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1986, off James Willman (TOL)...
Earned first career win on 4/15/1986...
Traded from Malibu to New Jersey on 3/1/1988 (Going to Mal: 3B B. Thompson. Going to NJ: P R. Maddocks, P J. Preston)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/16/1988, off Thomas Prahl (HAL)...
